name: ai-revolution-homepage
description: AI Revolution の LP（Next.js + TypeScript + Tailwind）

scripts.start: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && next start
scripts.kill:3000: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || echo 'No process found on port 3000'
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
